inclusion.criterion: Students must be in one of the identified classes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: from one of the participating grades
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Students must return a completed and signed parental consent form.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Students must be present at school on the day that the focus groups are conducted.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Students whose parents did not complete the consent form, and/or students who do not wish to participate can opt out of the focus groups without any penalty.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has CLL with large cell transformation. He had an excellent response to FCR therapy but then presented with rising white count and worsening lymphadenopathy.
